comment:
* Package private interface to "implementation" used by * {@link InetAddress}. *

* See {@link java.net.Inet4AddressImp} and * {@link java.net.Inet6AddressImp}. * * @since 1.4

methods.name: InetAddress[] lookupAllHostAddr(String hostname, int netId) throws UnknownHostException
methods.comment: * Lookup all addresses for {@code hostname} on the given {@code netId}.

methods.name: String getHostByAddr(byte[] addr) throws UnknownHostException
methods.comment: * Reverse-lookup the host name for a given {@code addr}.

methods.name: InetAddress[] loopbackAddresses()
methods.comment: * Return a list of loop back adresses for this implementation.

methods.name: boolean isReachable(InetAddress addr, int timeout, NetworkInterface netif, int ttl) throws IOException
methods.comment: * Whether {@code addr} is reachable over {@code netif}.

methodNames: InetAddress[] lookupAllHostAddr(String hostname, int netId) throws UnknownHostException
boolean isReachable(InetAddress addr, int timeout, NetworkInterface netif, int ttl) throws IOException
